Mixed

With the Stubborn add on, Eraser canâ€™t erase your role, Cleanser can't cleanse you, Bandit can't steal from you and Monarch can't knight you.
Additionally, you canâ€™t gain any new addons from the merchant.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Stubborns that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Stubborn
  • can have Stubborn
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role
